author: Matthew Impelli
title: Japan's Health Minister Warns 400,000 People Could Die From Coronavirus Without Social Distancing
description: "We don't expect 400,000 or so people to die. We can stop the spread of this infectious disease if we drastically reduce contact between people," Hiroshi Nishiura, an infectious disease expert on Japan's coronavirus task force, said.
content:
On Wednesday, Japan's health ministry projected that 400,000 people could die in the Asian country, without any social distancing measures in place.
The team of experts from Japan's health ministry used the forecast to show how important it is to take measur… [+2283 chars]
